title: Create a simple blog website

requirements.text: Create a backend data model for blog posts with fields: id (unique identifier), title (text), content (text), author (text), createdAt (timestamp), and published (boolean status)
acceptanceCriteria: Blog post type is defined in the Motoko backend
All required fields are present and properly typed
Each post has a unique identifier

requirements.text: Implement backend functions to create new blog posts, retrieve all published posts, retrieve a single post by id, update existing posts, and delete posts
acceptanceCriteria: CRUD operations are available for blog posts
Posts can be filtered by published status
Individual posts can be retrieved by their id

requirements.text: Create a home page that displays a list of all published blog posts showing title, author, creation date, and a preview of the content
acceptanceCriteria: Published posts are displayed in a list or grid
Each post shows title, author, date, and content preview
Posts are ordered by creation date (newest first)

requirements.text: Create a blog post detail page that displays the full content of a single post including title, author, creation date, and complete content
acceptanceCriteria: Users can navigate from the list to individual post pages
Full post content is displayed
All post metadata is visible

requirements.text: Create a form to add new blog posts with inputs for title, content, and author, and a publish toggle
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields
Users can toggle published status
Form submits data to the backend
Successful submission redirects or shows confirmation

requirements.text: Apply a clean, modern editorial design with elegant typography, comfortable reading spacing, and a sophisticated color palette that creates a pleasant reading experience
acceptanceCriteria: Design uses a consistent, editorial-focused visual theme
Typography is optimized for reading blog content
Color scheme is cohesive and avoids default blue/purple
Layout provides comfortable spacing for text content

nonGoals: User authentication or role-based access control
